What are the genetic changes related to dilated cardiomyopathy with ataxia syndrome ?,"Mutations in the DNAJC19 gene cause DCMA syndrome. The DNAJC19 gene provides instructions for making a protein found in structures called mitochondria, which are the energy-producing centers of cells.
